nice.palettes

Class ColorPalette

  • java.lang.Object
    • nice.palettes.ColorPalette

  • public class ColorPalette
extends java.lang.Object
    Nice Color Palette A JSON of the top color palettes on ColourLovers.com for Processing Inspired by https://www.npmjs.com/package/nice-color-palettes

      • colors

        public int[] colors

    • Constructor Detail

      • ColorPalette

        public ColorPalette(PApplet theParent)
        a Constructor, usually called in the setup() method in your sketch to initialize and start the Library. By default it will use the color palettes defined in the JSON attached with the library. Is it possibile to call the refresh() function to download a new JSON. If the file exists in the data folder of the sketch, this library will use it.
        Parameters:
        theParent - the parent PApplet

    • Method Detail

      • getPalette

        public int[] getPalette()
        return an array with a random color palette
        Returns:
        int[] and array of five different colors in the same palette

      • getPalette

        public int[] getPalette(int i)
        return an array with a color palette defined by the user and based on the size of the JSON.
        Parameters:
        i - number of the palette to load, maximum the JSON's size
        Returns:
        int[]

      • refresh

        public void refresh()
        Download a new color palette's JSON by calling the colourlovers.com API. Default: 20 results

      • refresh

        public void refresh(int i)
        Download a new color palette's JSON by calling the colourlovers.com API. A JSONArray will be saved in the sketch's data folder.
        Parameters:
        i - Number of results to return from the API, maximum of 100.

      • getPaletteCount

        public int getPaletteCount()
        Return the number of palettes available

      • version

        public static java.lang.String version()
        return the version of the Library.
        Returns:
        String
